ModMetaData.name: Decorative trees
ModMetaData.author: cattleya
ModMetaData.description:
In this mod two unusual trees were added which could be grown only in special pot. I recomend use this mod with SeedsPlease mod, but it worked without too.
Support me on patreon, it will motivate me to continue: https://www.patreon.com/cattleya . I public here some sketches, ideas, thoughts and anounces. Also be free to write me, maybe will draw some things for you for Rimworld!
All images in this mod are licensed under the CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 : https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/
